attributes.action: UK government should intervene to protect christian people worldwide
attributes.additional_details:
Christian people around the world are being persecuted, raped tortured and murdered. Yet this is not made known in the media. The people should vote to force the government to take action against such hate crimes.
 People should vote to force the government to take action against the forced daily mosque attendance of children. The control of women and the freedom of men to take a wife and a second , third and fourth wife that is recognised in Islamic Law but not in UK law. That the tax payer then has to pay for. This is back door Bygamy and should be prosecuted.
